channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: We’re Better Off Loved
item.description: Why are we normalizing killing as health care?

item.title: The Trump Administration Is Right to Re-Redesignate the Army Bases
item.description: The Defense Department has acted in accordance with the law, while preserving and honoring American history.

item.title: How Trump Can Resolve A Legal Battle Between Mining Rights And Religious Liberty

item.title: Trump directs ICE to deport illegal immigrants from cities, not 'heartland'

item.title: Trump Org Announces New Mobile Phone Service
item.description: NEW YORK, NEW YORK — The Trump Organization announced Monday the launch of a new mobile phone service, Trump Mobile. “We’ve been working for a long ti...

item.title: As Deportations Rise, The U.S. Is On Track For The Lowest Murder Rate On Record
item.description: When you let law enforcement catch criminals, you will get less crime.

item.title: G7 summit opens in Canada with a focus on trade, wars -- and not riling Trump

item.title: Five Reasons The Army‘s Birthday Parade Was Money Well Spent
item.description: It is too bad the protesters can’t stop fighting Trump long enough to appreciate the Army that preserves their freedom to protest.

item.title: The White House Can Lower Drug Prices By Fixing The Market, Not Price Controls
item.description: President Trump shouldn’t adopt socialist-style price controls.

item.title: Trump’s Dollar Problem
item.description: The last thing that the president needs is for a dollar decline to add more inflationary pressure.

item.title: Peace Through Strength Requires a Strong Defense of Human Rights
item.description: The future of U.S. foreign policy is brightest when we craft and implement policies that effectively advance both U.S. interests and human rights.

item.title: The Politicization of Everything Didn’t Start with Trump’s Kennedy Center Visit
item.description: Why is the New York Times , of all places, surprised?
